column2: This Privacy Policy explains what information is collected via the Mohegan Sun website located at mohegansun.com, why the information is collected and how it is used. Mohegan Sun does not share or sell your personal information to anyone. Mohegan Sun does not participate in any format of SPAM and will not send any unsolicited emails.
